mapper.select: select * from portfolio limit #{ pageStart}, #{ perPageNum }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portfolio (nickName, category, title, simpleContent, content, image) VALUES (#{ nickName }, #{ category }, #{ title }, #{ simpleContent }, #{ content }, #{ image })
mapper.select: select * from portfolio where pfNumber = #{ pfNumber }
mapper.update: UPDATE portfolio SET category=#{category}, title=#{title}, simpleContent=#{simpleContent}, content=#{content}, image=#{image}, regDate=NOW() WHERE pfNumber=#{pfNumber}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM portfolio WHERE pfNumber=#{ pfNumber }
